title: Periodic case: residue at s=1 equals periodic mean H
statement_md: For binary periodic sequences X with period T and mean H = T^{-1}\sum_{n=1}^T X(n), the Dirichlet series \(\zeta_X(s) = \sum_{n \ge 1} X(n) n^{-s}\) has a simple pole at s=1 with residue H.
assumptions_md: X is periodic (Tier-9 exact models); numerical verification here is auxiliary.
